question: Betsy wants to find out if the rainfall in her town contains pollutants. The best way for Betsy to gather this information would be to collect
candidate_answers: (A) one sample on one rainy day. (B) one sample a day on several rainy days. (C) several separate samples on one rainy day. (D) several separate samples on several rainy days.
answer: one sample a day on several rainy days.
label: B
